titleStmt.title: An ordinance of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament: for the inabling of Sr. William Brereton baronet, one of the members of the House of Commons, speedily to put in execution the ordinances for the sequestraion of the estates of Papists and delinquents ... and all other ordinances of Parliament, within the county of Chester ... and to take subsscriptions for the better supply and maintenance of the forces under his command ... also allowing unto the said Sir William Brereton the personall estates of all Papists and delinquents, in and about London ... as are not yet sequestred, or discovered for the service aforesaid.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.
Brereton, William, Sir, 1604-1661.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Wright in the Old-Baily,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland
